Content: "You know," said Arthur, "it's at times like this, when I'm trapped in a Vogon airlock with a man from Betelgeuse, and about to die of asphyxiation in deep space that I really wish I'd listened to what my mother told me when I was young." Why, what did she tell you? "I don't know, I didn't listen."
Source: The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy
Author: Douglas Adams
